statements: SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature >= 25.0
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM climate_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE humidity < 60.0
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31'
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM climate_data WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY humidity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-02-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-02-28' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE humidity < 40 AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, temperature, timestamp FROM Temperature_Log WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM Temperature_Log WHERE temperature < 15 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM Temperature_Log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM Temperature_Log WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature FROM Temperature_Log WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM Temperature_Log GROUP BY DATE(timestamp);
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM Temperature_Log JOIN Humidity_Log ON Temperature_Log.id = Humidity_Log.id WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, DATE(timestamp) AS date, temperature FROM Temperature_Log WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY temperature DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, humidity FROM humidity_data WHERE humidity < 60.0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT temperature_sensor_id, target_temperature FROM climate_control_system WHERE target_temperature BETWEEN 22.0 AND 24.0;
SELECT humidity_sensor_id, target_humidity FROM climate_control_system WHERE target_humidity > 70.0;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM humidity_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND humidity > 50 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT system_id, target_temperature, target_humidity FROM climate_control_system WHERE target_temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25 AND target_humidity < 60;

SELECT temperature, humidity FROM temperature_data JOIN humidity_data ON temperature_data.sensor_id = humidity_data.sensor_id WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC;
SELECT MAX(temperature), MIN(temperature) FROM temperature_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING MAX(temperature) > 30 AND MIN(temperature) < 15;
SELECT * FROM temperature_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM temperature_log WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, humidity FROM humidity_log WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM humidity_log ORDER BY humidity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, status FROM climate_control_system WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM temperature_log WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, humidity FROM humidity_log WHERE humidity < 40 AND location = 'Living Room';
SELECT timestamp, location, humidity FROM humidity_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM temperature_log WHERE location = 'Bedroom' ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT control_number, status FROM climate_control_system WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, temperature FROM Humidity_Logs WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT * FROM Climate_Zones WHERE zone_name = 'Living Room';
SELECT zone_id, temperature FROM Climate_Zone_Temperature ORDER BY zone_id ASC;
SELECT zone_id, humidity FROM Climate_Zone_Humidity WHERE humidity < 70;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature FROM Temperature_Logs WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT zone_name, temperature, humidity FROM Climate_Zones JOIN Climate_Zone_Temperature ON Climate_Zones.zone_id = Climate_Zone_Temperature.zone_id JOIN Climate_Zone_Humidity ON Climate_Zones.zone_id = Climate_Zone_Humidity.zone_id ORDER BY zone_name;

SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS average_humidity FROM Climate_Zone_Temperature JOIN Climate_Zone_Humidity ON Climate_Zone_Temperature.zone_id = Climate_Zone_Humidity.zone_id;

SELECT zone_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_logs FROM Climate_Zones JOIN Climate_Zone_Temperature ON Climate_Zones.zone_id = Climate_Zone_Temperature.zone_id JOIN Climate_Zone_Humidity ON Climate_Zones.zone_id = Climate_Zone_Humidity.zone_id GROUP BY zone_name ORDER BY number_of_logs DESC;
